creator: binoy.shah@infostretch.com
text:
Created attachment 30066
Contains Error Snapshots.

Expected Result:

It should open Help Dialogue box for respective jmeter component when focus is on 'Name' field.

Actual Result:

It performs 'Back Space' operation while clicking 'CTRL + H' for respective jmeter component when focus is on 'Name' field.

OR

It removes one character while clicking 'CTRL + H' for respective jmeter component when focus is on 'Name' field.


Steps to reproduce:

1. Open Jmeter.
2. Add any Jmeter component.
3. Focus on 'Name' field.
4. Click CTRL + H.

It should open Help Dialogue but it removes one character.

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text: This is the default behaviour for CTRL+H in input field. Which all users are used to so I don't think it's a good idea to change it.
